QuestData.Title: Flight to Theramore
QuestData.Description: Listen, I got no special love for the Alliance... but then again, I got no real hate for you guys either.$b$bYour gold is as good as anyone else's. Sometimes better.$b$bJeyne left some gold for your travel costs. I believe the person you're looking for in Dustwallow goes by the name of Calia Hastings. And the best way to get there is to talk to our flight master, Bragok. He'll fly you there, if you want. The flight's free, thanks to your friend.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Bragok in Ratchet to fly to Theramore. Then report to Calia Hastings.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Calia Hastings at Theramore in Dustwallow Marsh.
